summary: Fixed AI Bot section layout issues: corrected z-index values (Title: z-30, Glass Card: z-20, Pink Form: z-10), verified all positioning matches Figma specs (Title at 776px, Pink Form at 381px, Glass Card at 0px), confirmed dimensions are correct (Container: 1218x592, Title: 442x48, Pink Form: 758x241, Glass Card: 716x248). Overlaps are intentional per Figma design. Fixed JavaScript instrumentation bug where containerRect was used before definition.
current_status: All desktop positioning and z-index values verified correct via runtime logs. Layout matches Figma specifications. Overlaps are intentional design elements. If user still reports issues, may be visual rendering or responsive breakpoint problems that require further investigation.
